experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis leaves under the condition of salt-induced senescence

description.text: Our study identified long term salt stress treatment to induce symptoms similar to developmental senescence. In order to identify possible crosstalk components shared between developmental and salt-triggered senescence. We first obtained the expression profile of Arabidopsis leaves under the condition of salt-induced senescence (4 days) and then compared it with the transcriptome of developmental leaf senescence. Wild type Arabidopsis Col-0 plants were grown hydroponically and treated with or without 150mM NaCl and harvested after 4 days of treatment.

bibliography.authors: Allu AD, Soja AM, Wu A, Szymanski J, Balazadeh S
bibliography.title: Salt stress and senescence: identification of cross-talk regulatory components.
